item.description: The deal won’t resolve national security concerns.

item.title: Review: Framework Desktop is a mash-up of a regular desktop PC and the Mac Studio
item.description: Size matters most for Framework’s first stab at a desktop workstation/gaming PC.

item.title: AMD’s new 96-core Threadripper CPU will set you back $11,699

item.title: Chinese firms rush for Nvidia chips as US prepares to lift ban
item.description: H20 chips, designed to skirt export bans, are back after Trump meets with CEO.
